original: JOHANSSON, Elias Verner, Direktör, Strömsund, f Ramsele, Vnorrl l, 10/1 82 av hemm.äg E J o Ingrid Eliedtr, gm Zulamith Sundelin. Hsands tekn elem.sk, Armour Inst of Techn i Chicago. Anst å olika platser i Sv o utl t 10, därefter ing o, sed. 20 vkst dir v AB Per Holms Elektricitetsverk. Styr.ordfdär o i Ströms Wattudals Turistfrn. Varit led av kyrko- o skolråd, v. ordf i kyrkoflm o kyrkostämma o led av fattigv.styr o landsting; är led av kommunalflm (fd v. ordf), v. ordf i kommnnalnmd (fd ordf), ordf i yrkes-sk.styr o luftskyddsnmdn samt led av ett flert utredn- o byggn.ktéer. Resor: USA 05 —08, Tyskl 08—09. Hobbies: Fiske, turistväsendet, sport.
translated: JOHANSSON, Elias Verner, Director, Strömsund, b. Ramsele, Vnorrl I, 10/1 82 son of home owner E J and Ingrid Eliedtr, m. Zulamith Sundelin. Attended technical elementary school, Armour Institute of Technology in Chicago. Employed at various places in Sweden and abroad until 10, then unemployed, then appointed deputy director at AB Per Holms Elektricitetsverk. Chairman of the board and director of Ströms Wattudals Tourist Union. Has been a member of church and school councils, vice chairman of church association and church assembly, and a member of the poor relief board and county council; currently a member of the municipal assembly (former vice chairman), vice chairman of the municipal committee (former chairman), chairman of the vocational school committee and the air defense committee, as well as a member of several investigation and building committees. Travel: USA 05-08, Germany 08-09. Hobbies: Fishing, tourism, sports.
